page.title: 12SHOPS
page.content: I'm doing a project on shops.Shops started in Saxon times and they're still here now.Some of our shops sell groceries.Groceries are all different kinds of fruit,veg,sugar,salt,pepper, tinned things etc.Markets are like outside shops.They sell the same kind of stuff but they shout out what they sell & the item's price. Here in Broadclyst we've got two sweet shops and one garage that sells sweets.Both of the other shops sell bits & bobs (food,drink,toys etc). {GATEWAYS}is our big supermarket.It sells everything down to clothes.It sells toys,makeup,food,fruit,junkfood. Most prices have gone up (or so people say) so some people have stoped going. Lots of people just go to the local shops because it saves time.Maybe they don't approve of big shops,but don't worry {GATEWAYS}won't close down{.
